title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.7 - Site size
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.7 - Site size

State Regulations

After the effective date of this Part, any site established at a new or existing park shall be a minimum of 5,000 square feet. Additional area shall be provided where needed to meet the requirements of sections
17.5
(b) and
17.6
(b)(1)
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
17.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
